attributes.additional_details:
There has been little resource for the National Wildlife Crime Unit.As a result, convictions have fallen to historic lows – despite hunting groups claiming that the practice is as popular as ever.

Send a clear message to the Government. It is time to truly end this barbaric blood sport for good!
attributes.background:
Fox Hunting was banned in 2004. Theresa May has said that she has "always been in favour of fox hunting", while Michael Gove has so far refused to close loopholes in the law.
Illegal fox hunts are still taking place without proper punishment.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take.

We aren't clear whether you would like a change in the law or more funding and resources given to enforcing existing laws.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the change you would like to happen.
